#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0)
    {
        t--;
        int n,k;
        cin>>n>>k;
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        vector<char> v;
        v.resize(n,'\0');
        
        int same = 1;
        int prev  = s[0];
        int start = 0;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]==prev)
            {
                same++;
                if(same==k)
                    break;
            }
            else
            {
                same = 1;
                start = i;
                prev = s[i];
            }
        }
        if(same <k)
        {
            cout<<-1<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        int count = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<start;i++)
        {
            if(v[i]!=s[i])
            {
                count++;
                for(int j=0;j<k;j++)
                {
                    v[i+j] = s[i];
                }
            }
        }
        for(int i=n-1;i>=start+k;i--)
        {
            if(v[i]!=s[i])
            {
                count++;
                for(int j=0;j<k;j++)
                {
                    v[i-j] = s[i];
                }
            }
        }
        for(int i=start;i<start+k;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]!=v[i])
            {
                count++;
                break;
            }
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
